title: The Curse of Betrayal
description: Ryder has finally decided to take her life into her own hands, but things don’t always turn out as they seem. Ollie and Ari have made a pact that leaves Ryder alone until she ends the curse and chooses her soul mate.With her knights absent, Ryder becomes independent, seeing things in her visions that force her to question the curse—and herself.As strange things happen at Demi God Academy, Ryder realizes everything comes back to her. She must use the power growing within her to protect her new friends in ways she never imagined possible. But as new threats surface, she may not be strong enough to protect them all.In book two of A Curse Books, Ryder discovers what it really means to be Eurydice.
author: Taylor Lavati
